products.name: Nike Air Max 270
products.description: Experience the comfort and style of the Nike Air Max 270. These sneakers feature a large air unit for cushioning and a sleek design.

products.name: Apple MacBook Pro
products.description: The new Apple MacBook Pro features a stunning 16-inch Retina display, powerful processors, and all-day battery life.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: Meet the Samsung Galaxy S21. The smartphone that sets the new standard with its groundbreaking camera and cutting-edge performance.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones offer industry-leading noise cancellation, exceptional sound quality, and a comfortable design.

products.name: GoPro HERO9 Black
products.description: Capture stunning 5K video and 20MP photos with the GoPro HERO9 Black. Features a front display, powerful battery, and advanced video stabilization.
